description.zh-cn: 为纪念习仲勋诞辰100周年而制作的6集文献纪录片，于2013年10月在中国中央电视台播出。
description.en: A 6-episode documentary produced to commemorate the 100th anniversary of Xi Zhongxun's birth, broadcast on China Central Television in October 2013.

description.zh-cn: 伟大的共产主义战士，杰出的无产阶级革命家，中国共产党和中国人民解放军卓越的政治工作领导人，中国改革开放事业重要的开拓者之一。其主要贡献包括参与创建陕甘边根据地和在广东创建经济特区。
description.en: A great communist fighter, an outstanding proletarian revolutionary, an exceptional political work leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Liberation Army, and one of the important pioneers of China's reform and opening-up. His main contributions include participating in the creation of the Shaan-Gan-Bian Base Area and establishing special economic zones in Guangdong.

description.zh-cn: 中国中央电视台旗下的综合频道，播出了文献纪录片《习仲勋》。
description.en: The general channel of China Central Television, which broadcast the documentary 'Xi Zhongxun'.

description.zh-cn: 中国中央电视台旗下的纪录片频道，播出了文献纪录片《习仲勋》。
description.en: The documentary channel of China Central Television, which broadcast the documentary 'Xi Zhongxun'.

description.zh-cn: 由习仲勋等人参与创建的革命根据地，后成为中央红军长征的落脚点和抗日战争的出发地。
description.en: A revolutionary base area co-founded by Xi Zhongxun and others, which later became the destination for the Central Red Army's Long March and the starting point for the War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的主力之一，其长征的落脚点是陕甘边根据地。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, whose Long March destination was the Shaan-Gan-Bian Base Area.

en: War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression

description.zh-cn: 指20世纪中期第二次世界大战中，中国抵抗日本侵略的全面战争。陕甘边根据地是其出发地之一。
description.en: Refers to the full-scale war of resistance fought by China against Japanese aggression during World War II in the mid-20th century. The Shaan-Gan-Bian Base Area was one of its starting points.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国省级行政区。习仲勋在此主政期间创建了经济特区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative region of the People's Republic of China where Xi Zhongxun established special economic zones while in charge.

description.zh-cn: 中国改革开放初期，在特定地区设立的实行特殊经济政策和经济管理体制的区域概念。
description.en: A concept for areas established in specific regions of China during the early stages of reform and opening-up, implementing special economic policies and management systems.

description.zh-cn: 1978年以来中国共产党推行的以经济建设为中心的国家级政策，习仲勋是其重要的开拓者之一。
description.en: A national policy centered on economic development pursued by the Communist Party of China since 1978, of which Xi Zhongxun was an important pioneer.

description.zh-cn: 在纪录片《习仲勋》播出前于中央电视台综合频道黄金剧场播出的电视剧。
description.en: A TV series that aired in the prime time slot on CCTV-1 before the documentary 'Xi Zhongxun'.

description.zh-cn: 在纪录片《习仲勋》播出后于中央电视台综合频道黄金剧场播出的电视剧。
description.en: A TV series that aired in the prime time slot on CCTV-1 after the documentary 'Xi Zhongxun'.

description.zh-cn: 该纪录片是为纪念习仲勋诞辰100周年而制作的献礼作，旨在回顾并宣传其功勋卓著的奋斗历程。
description.en: This documentary was a tribute produced to commemorate the 100th anniversary of Xi Zhongxun's birth, aiming to review and publicize his distinguished and meritorious life journey.

description.zh-cn: 于2013年10月在黄金剧场播出了文献纪录片《习仲勋》。
description.en: Broadcast the documentary 'Xi Zhongxun' in its prime time slot in October 2013.

description.zh-cn: 于2013年10月播出了文献纪录片《习仲勋》。
description.en: Broadcast the documentary 'Xi Zhongxun' in October 2013.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋是陕甘边根据地的创建参与者之一。
description.en: Xi Zhongxun was one of the participants in the founding of the Shaan-Gan-Bian Base Area.

description.zh-cn: 陕甘边根据地成为中央红军长征的落脚点，为中央红军提供了休整和发展的基地。
description.en: The Shaan-Gan-Bian Base Area became the destination of the Central Red Army's Long March, providing a base for them to rest and develop.

description.zh-cn: 陕甘边根据地成为抗日战争的出发地，为抗战提供了战略支持。
description.en: The Shaan-Gan-Bian Base Area became a starting point for the War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression, providing strategic support for the war effort.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋在主政广东期间，创建了经济特区，推动了这一政策的实施。
description.en: While in charge of Guangdong, Xi Zhongxun established Special Economic Zones, pushing forward the implementation of this policy.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国改革开放事业重要的开拓者，习仲勋通过在广东创建经济特区等行动，有力地推动了改革开放进程。
description.en: As an important pioneer of China's reform and opening-up, Xi Zhongxun vigorously promoted the process through actions such as establishing Special Economic Zones in Guangdong.
